original_text: For he had commanded the unclean spirit to come out of the man. (For many a time it had seized him. He was kept under guard and bound with chains and shackles, but he would break the bonds and be driven by the demon into the desert.)
korean_text: 이는 예수께서 이미 더러운 귀신을 명하사 그 사람에게서 나오라 하셨음이라 (귀신이 가끔 그 사람을 붙잡으므로 그를 쇠사슬과 고랑에 매어 지켰으되 그 맨 것을 끊고 귀신에게 몰려 광야로 나갔더라)

sentences.original_text: For he had commanded the unclean spirit
to come out of the man.
For many a time it had seized him.
sentences.korean_translation: 여러 번 그가 그를 사로잡았기 때문입니다.

sentences.original_text: and bound with chains and shackles,
but he would break the bonds
and be driven by the demon into the desert.
